mapper.select: select c.id as id, c.office_phone_no office_phoneNo, c.mobile_phone_no mobile_phoneNo, c.email_address as email_address from organization o join organization_secondary_contact osc on osc.organization_id = o.id join contact c on osc.contact_id = c.id where o.id = #{organizationId}

o.name like concat('%', #{nameFilter}, '%')
